Localization.DescDemo:
DEMO
Run the application in which you can view the finished reports, as well as to open the designer and try your skills at creating your own ones.
Localization.DescDocumentation:
DOCUMENTATION
Start using the reporting tool with reading the user manual. This is necessary to improve your knowledge and experience in creating reports of any complexity.
Localization.DescForum:
FORUM
Join a users community and discuss issues related to the software. On the message board you can share your experience with other forum participants.
Localization.DescSampleProject:
SAMPLE PROJECTS
In this section you can find lots of project ideas using the report generator. You are able to immediately put them into practice in your applications.
Localization.DescSupport:
SUPPORT
Something goes wrong with your reports? Ask our technical managers. Experienced professionals are ready to relieve the problems and issues you may have.
Localization.DescVideo:
VIDEO
Dozens of clips to create reports of any complexity are available on our website. For easy viewing, video tutorials are thematically joined into categories.
Localization.WelcomeDesc:
We are pleased you are running now reporting tool Stimulsoft Reports.Net. The product is carefully designed for WinForms and used for creating reports of a high quality for you, your business and your customers. An exciting moment is coming! In a few moments you will be able to start designing your own reports.

Have a good time in making the first steps with Stimulsoft Reports.

Report.name: Simple List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple list report.

video.name: How to Create Simple List
video.desc: In this video you will learn how to create a report with simple list.

video.name: How to Create List Report
video.desc: This video you will be shown how to design a List report.

video.name: How to Create Report Using Dictionary
video.desc: This video will show you how quickly you can create a report using dictionary.

video.name: How to Use Word Wrap and Grow to Height
video.desc: This video shows the basics of creating reports using Word Wrap and Grow to Height.

Report.name: Two Simple Lists
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create two simple list reports.

video.name: How to Create MultiPage Report
video.desc: This video you will be shown how to create multipage report.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use highlight condition to create a report.

video.desc: In this video you will be introduced to a tutorial which shows creating reports with Highlight Condition.

video.name: How to create Report with Highlight Condition
video.desc: In this video you will learn to create reports with Highlight Condition.

video.name: How to create Report with Hightlight Condition using Styles
video.desc: This video will show you how easy it is to build a report with Hightlight Condition using Styles.

video.desc: In this video you will learn how to create a report with Conditions.

Report.name: Multi-Column List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns. To create a report with columns set the Columns property of a page to two or more.

video.name: How to Create Report with Columns on Page
video.desc: In this video you will learn the basics of creating reports reports with columns on the report page.

video.name: How to Create Report with Columns 1
video.desc: This video will take you from start to finish of one of the ways of creating reports with columns.

video.name: How to Create Report with Columns 2
video.desc: This video provides a detailed description of another way of creating reports with columns.

Report.name: Multi-Column Bands, Across-Down
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - across then down.

video.name: How to Create Report with Column on DataBand
video.desc: This video will show you how quickly you can design a report with a column on the data band.

Report.name: Multi-Column Bands, Down-Across
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - down then across.

video.name: How to Create Report with Column on DataBand
video.desc: In this video you will learn the basics of creating a report with column on the data band.

video.desc: In this video see how to properly you can design a report with the Label Report Wizard.
